page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content: His most important time for Mr. George is in the Autumn. His most tedious job is fixing barbed wire fencing, but unfortunately this is a job he often has to do. Farming has always been Mr. Georges dream job, although in 1984 he had a terrible crop. The worst years for him though, were 1975 and 1976 when there was a bad drought. To help Mr. George with his farming he has such implements as a walking rotavator, a garden tractor, and a chain saw, as well as many other items. These help to make farms more efficient, and farming a lot faster. Away from farming Mr. George does not have a lot of time for hobbies or pastimes, although he does have a passion for motorcycles.
